pages.text: This revolutionary mod by SizDizarm creates a solution to the age old Mineraft problem of 'Why can't I sit in a chair at a table like a civilized person?'  Although there is no -3 to mood buff from eating without a table, now you can meet your needs with this simple mod!
Get some wood to begin, you will need Schematics from the mod as well to craft your table/chairs.
With a table/chair combo placed next to eachother, you can now sit in it without that -3 to mood debuff and virtually imagine yourself eating some breakfast scones while you play Minecraft. Huzzah!
